   <script type="text/javascript">
    function StartTime() {
        var ts = document.getElementById('ctl11_HeaderContent_HFTimeout');
        var t = ts.value * 1000;

        setTimeout("MouseHover()", t);
    }

    function MouseHover() {
        if ($('iframe#modal').is(':visible')) {
        } else {
            var bodyHeight = $(document).height();
            $('.option').hide();
            $('<div class="aftrBodyBg"></div>').prependTo('body');
            $('.aftrBodyBg').height(bodyHeight);
            $('.confirm-dialog').addClass('showAlertPop');
            $('.confirm-dialog').css("position", "absolute");
            $('.confirm-dialog').css("top", (($(window).height() - $('.confirm-dialog').outerHeight()) / 2) + $(window).scrollTop() + "px");
            $('.confirm-dialog').css("left", (($(window).width() - $('.confirm-dialog').outerWidth()) / 2) + $(window).scrollLeft() + "px");
            return this;
        }
    }
   </script>
